section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce in 75-661, United States against Antelope and for reason stated and an opinion filed with the clerk in this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit is reversed and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent of this opinion.
